name: Nuage de ma Vie
description:
A story inspired by real life events. You experience some of the most difficult times of a middle age women.  The loss of a spouse.

It is 2 day of the funeral. You are in the apartment that you recently purchased with your deceased husband. He was excited about the idea of living in this apartment. You have saved for years to buy it but he is no longer with you.

Although you are in your home, everything looks different. there are too many people, some of them cry, some of them laugh, they all chatter..

Struggling to  accept death and the idea of an entirely life, all you ask for is time with your daughters and a calm environment.
